trans-unit.source: Represents a row of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that can contain controls.
The containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> class, specifying the containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
Gets the size and location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />, including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che rappresenta le dimensioni e posizione.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> property gets only the client elements of the control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> property gets the nonclient and client elements.
trans-unit.target: Mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> proprietà ottiene solo gli elementi client del controllo, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> proprietà ottiene gli elementi non client e client.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to be dragged and dropped into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> can be dragged and dropped into a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.

<see langword="true" /> if there is enough space in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> to receive the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets the controls in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
An array of controls.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di controlli.

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> che rappresenta lo spazio predefinito tra i controlli.

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> che rappresenta la spaziatura interna del contenuto di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the display area of the control.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the size and location.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che rappresenta le dimensioni e posizione.

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> property gets the nonclient and client elements, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> property gets only the client elements of the control.
trans-unit.target: Mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds%2A> proprietà ottiene gli elementi non client e client, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.DisplayRectangle%2A> proprietà ottiene solo gli elementi client del controllo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose` (metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro è true, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow> riferimenti.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo richiama il metodo `Dispose` di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see langword="Dispose" /> può essere chiamato più volte da altri oggetti.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> prestare attenzione a non fare riferimento a oggetti che sono stati eliminati in una precedente chiamata a <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su come implementare <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, vedere [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [si esegue l'override del metodo Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the control's layout engine.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> per il contenuto del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between controls.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> che rappresenta lo spazio tra i controlli.

trans-unit.source: The original value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property.
The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property.
Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds" /> property changes.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato un evento, il gestore dell'evento viene richiamato tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged%2A> consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: È la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> in una classe derivata, verificare di chiamare il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnBoundsChanged(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Rectangle)" /> della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The control that was added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
The zero-based index representing the position of the added control.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato un evento, il gestore dell'evento viene richiamato tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded%2A> consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: È la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> in una classe derivata, verificare di chiamare il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlAdded(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The control that was removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
The zero-based index representing the position of the removed control.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato un evento, il gestore dell'evento viene richiamato tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved%2A> consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: È la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> in una classe derivata, verificare di chiamare il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnControlRemoved(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32)" /> della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato un evento, il gestore dell'evento viene richiamato tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout%2A> consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: È la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> in una classe derivata, verificare di chiamare il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation" /> property changes.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato un evento, il gestore dell'evento viene richiamato tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged%2A> consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: È la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> in una classe derivata, verificare di chiamare il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.OnOrientationChanged" /> della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the layout direction of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" /> relative to its containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the control.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> che rappresenta le caratteristiche di spaziatura interna del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> che contiene <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow" />.
